titleStmt.title: The States-man's almanack being an excellent new ballad in which the qualities of each month are consider'd, whereby it appears that a parliament cannot meet in any of the old months : with a proposal for mending the kalendar, humbly offered to the packers of the next Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Dated: September the 1st. From the imperial camp before Belgrade to Chavelier Janco Don Lazarillo.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
